title.rendered: Student-Athletes Celebrated at Spring Signing Event

content.rendered:
Saratoga Springs High School recently celebrated the following student-athletes for their commitment to compete at the collegiate level.

  • Emily Landau – Golf at McDaniel College
  • Logan Allen – Basketball at SUNY Canton
  • Charles Dybala -Track and Field at Williams College
  • Ella Gennoy – Basketball at SUNY Oneonta
  • Jacob Bernd – XC and Track at University of Rochester
  • Luke Dacey – XC and Track at SUNY Geneseo
  • Johnathan Panarese – Baseball at St. Olaf
  • Sarah Decker – Softball at RPI
  • Natalie Conroy – Softball at SUNY Adirondack
  • Jillian Ferrie – Swimming at Hartwick College
  • Parker Laurin – Lacrosse at Hartwick College
  • Adam O’Connor –  Cheerleading at Rutgers University
  • Parker Wilcox – Lacrosse at Nazareth University
  • Noelle Slye – Volleyball at Kutztown University
  • Brooke Poutre – Volleyball at Finger Lakes Comm College
  • Taylor Plue – Tennis at SUNY Oneonta
  • Paige Barlow – Soccer at Nazareth University
  • Mazie Neville – Soccer at Tufts University
  • Ian Burnett – Track and Field at SUNY Plattsburgh
  • Braydon Goddard – Lacrosse at Castleton
  • Ben VanValkenburg – Soccer at King’s College
  • Colin Reinhart – Lacrosse at St. John Fisher
  • Tobey Diulio – Lacrosse at Clarkson University
  • Nick Darcangelo – Lacrosse at SUNY New Paltz

In the fall, 18 student-athletes signed National Letters of Intent to compete at the collegiate level.  Congratulations to all of our amazing student-athletes!
